subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[break]] (something); to [[crush]]; to [[smash]]; to [[push]] [[down]]
# to [[bend]]; to [[flex]]
# to [[dampen]]; to [[strike]]; to [[attack]]; to [[defeat]]; to [[frustrate]]; to [[deflate]]; to [[obstruct]]; to [[oppress]]
# [[setback]]; [[frustration]]; [[obstruction]]
